content.prompt: The establishment and growth of St. Petersburg during the early eighteenth century was part of Peter the Great' s attempt to do which of the following?

choices.label: Strengthen his alliances with the Baltic states
Remake Russian institutions to be as effective as those in western Europe
Reduce the high cost of government in the old capital of Moscow
Discourage further Russian expansion eastward into Asia

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
